description: Number of n-node graphs not determined by their spectrum.
references: C. Godsil and B. D. McKay, Some computational results on the spectra of graphs, pp. 73-92 of Combinatorial Mathematics IV (Adelaide 1975), Lect. Notes Math., 560 (1976).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Andries E. Brouwer, Numbers of characteristic polynomials and cospectral graphs for A
A. E. Brouwer and E. Spence, Cospectral graphs on 12 vertices, Electr. J. Combin. 16 (2009) N20. (p. 199).
E. Spence, Numbers of characteristic polynomials and cospectral graphs for A
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Determined by Spectrum
crossrefs: Cf. A178925 (simple graphs determined by spectrum).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Two more terms from _Ruperto Corso_, Dec 18 2011
